I joined @sethmoulton and @RepBrianFitz to call for support for our food banks, shelters, domestic violence services, houses of worship, early care and education centers, and more -- by increasing unemployment insurance reimbursement, incentives to donate, and available loans.

Florida’s unemployment system is still broken & slow.

While I don't have direct influence over this state program, we’re doing everything possible to help them fix it.

If you live in the 10th District, please contact my office if you are having trouble getting information.

America’s charities need support right now, just like our small businesses. 

They’re vital in the best of times, and even more so now.

The next emergency relief package should include that support.
